column4: can anybody please tell me about "Why I am getting ip address as 192.168.1.4" in Ubuntu server instead of getting 192.168.1.2

whereas I configured at time of installation as DHCP
now everytime I reboot it, it acquires 192.168.1.4
what can be the problem ? please help
As in, do you have networkmanager running?

Just try to stop dhcpcd from autostartingand reconfigure it to use a custom IP adress
